item.title: Implementing OpenTelemetry in a Rust application for performance monitoring
item.description: OpenTelemetry can be used to instrument Rust applications in production for performance monitoring. OpenTelemetry provides libraries, APIs, and SDKs to collect telemetry data(logs, metrics, and traces), using which you can monitor and debug your Rust application for...
